title: Pasta With Spicy Italian Sausage, Broccoli Rabe, And Sun-dried
summary: Pasta With Spicy Italian Sausage, Broccoli Rabe, And Sun-dried might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 839 calories, 24g of protein, and 40g of fat each. For $2.5 per serving, this recipe covers 32% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. A mixture of pasta, parmesan cheese, sausage, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. To use up the salt you could follow this main course with the Apple Turnovers Recipe as a dessert. This recipe is typical of Mediterranean cuisine. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 80%. This score is pretty good. Try Pasta with Spicy Italian Sausage, Broccoli Rabe, and Sun-dried Tomato Pesto, Broccoli Rabe Pasta with Spicy Italian Sausage (Zucchini Noodles), and Orecchiette With Broccoli Rabe, Spicy Italian Sausage, and Pesto for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian on the menu? Try pairing with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Castellani Chianti Annata with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 14 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Castellani Chianti Annata
productMatches.description: Bright ruby red colored. The nose is intense and fruity with a violet fragrance and a slight hint of cherries and red currant. The palate is dry and balanced, lightly tannic which turns into velvety softness.Pairs well with delicious pastas to spicy pasta dishes. Ideal with roasts, steaks, and grilled veal.Blend: 90% Sangiovese, 10% Ciliegiolo
